name: jsrf_character_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jet_set_radio_api.
Tool description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
API description: Fetch a single character by ID from the Jet Set Radio API.

characterid.description: The unique identifier of the character.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to '5'.

orderby.description:
Possible Values:
 - `asc`
 - `desc`

sortBy must be present for this to take effect. 
The default value is `asc`

sortby.description: The field by which to sort the results, such as 'name' or 'stats'. Defaults to 'name'.
